segments.text: I need to find the cereal aisle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The cereal is over by the breakfast foods .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's by the oatmeal and breakfast bars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I can find that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you need help finding anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I do need to find the dishwashing detergent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be over by the paper towels and toilet paper .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought it was over there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really appreciate all your help .
segments.speaker: S1
